lead_paragraph: In an effort to lure new home buyers, the minimum down payment for some mortgages was cut and taxes paid on the sale of existing properties shrank.

headline.main: China Acts to Stem Slide in Home Prices
headline.print_headline: China Acts to Stem Slide in Home Prices

snippet: In an effort to lure new home buyers, the minimum down payment for some mortgages was cut and taxes paid on the sale of existing properties shrank.
